bundles.title: Make It Last
bundles.description: Make it last with our largest handle Mug paired with the battery-extending Sliding Lid. It’s the perfect combination for taking a great cup of coffee outdoors or on the road. Keep your extra charging coaster at home or in the office, so wherever you go, a quick charge isn’t far away.

bundles.title: Travel Mug Accessories
bundles.description: Make the most of your Ember Travel Mug with the full lineup of accessories. This bundle includes everything you need to enhance your Ember Mug experience.
